nodes.bodyText: I don't think we need to run this for every annotation. I'd place this if  block outside the loop.

Hm, maybe we could simplify the code a little bit. Function<> getQualifierExtractor(annotation.name()) -> Collection<AnnotationInstance> getQualifiers(annotation) and the loop could be replaced with beanDeployment.getQualifiers(annotation).forEach(qualifiers::add);. WDYT?
Ok, I will change that to the suggested method. You're right that it's easier to read and use.
These could be final... but it's just a minor.
These will be removed altogether accordingly to your earlier suggestion.
